sentences.en: A Berber rug makes a colourful wall-hanging.
sentences.cn: 柏柏尔小地毯可以当色彩艳丽的壁毯。

sentences.en: A Persian rug covered the hardwood floors.
sentences.cn: 硬木地板上铺着一张波斯地毯。

sentences.en: Finding a rug that's just the colour, size and price you want can be well-nigh impossible.
sentences.cn: 找到一块颜色、尺寸和价格都符合你要求的毛毯几乎是不可能的。

sentences.en: His shoe had rucked up one corner of the pale rug.
sentences.cn: 他的鞋子把浅色地毯的一角弄皱了。

sentences.en: Humphrey paced the rug behind his desk and demanded rhetorically.
sentences.cn: 汉弗莱在他办公桌后面的地毯上,一边踱着步子一边慷慨激昂地问道.

sentences.en: In his sleeping bag he'll be as snug as a bug in a rug.
sentences.cn: 躺在睡袋里他会感觉温暖又舒适.

sentences.en: The chair was bolted through the rug to the steel floor.
sentences.cn: 椅子透过地毯固定在坚硬的地上.

sentences.en: The color of these curtains approximates that of the rug.
sentences.cn: 这些窗帘的颜色与地毯的颜色接近.

sentences.en: The cushions were soft blue to match the Chinese rug on the floor.
sentences.cn: 这些靠垫是柔和的蓝色，与地板上的中国小地毯很相配。

sentences.en: The designs in the rug are well proportioned.
The multicoloured rag rug was chosen to liven up the grey carpet.
sentences.cn: 选择这块五彩缤纷的碎呢小毯是为了给这灰色的地毯添些生气。

sentences.en: The old lady was seated in her chair at the window, a rug over her knees.
sentences.cn: 这位老妇人坐在靠窗的椅子上，膝上盖着一块小毛毯。

sentences.en: This rug tones in well with the wallpaper and furniture.
sentences.cn: 地毯和壁纸、家具配合得非常协调.

sentences.en: We couldn't afford to buy a new rug.
sentences.cn: 我们买不起新的小地毯。

sentences.en: We had pulled the rug out from under Bormann.
sentences.cn: 我们挖了博尔曼的墙脚.

phrases.tran_cn: 突然撤销对某人的支持，突然停止支持某人；拆某人的台

trans.tran_cn: 小块地毯，〈英〉（围盖膝的）围毯，车毯，〈美俚男子假发
trans.tran_en: a piece of thick cloth or wool that covers part of a floor, used for warmth or as a decoration
